jobDescription: Position: Marketing Automation, AnalystDepartment: Marketing The Marketing Automation Analyst is responsible for data migration and data processes to support the organization. This position will work closely with marketing automation technical system managers to document business requirements and system designs. Responsibilities:Support the migration of data between multiple Marketing systems.Produce data requirements documents for review by technical teamsDetermine data quality issues, gaps and alignmentKey contributor for multiple concurrent projects with stakeholders across Marketing, Sales, Operations, and Information TechnologyRequired Skills/Experience:2+ years experience in marketing technology, marketing systems infrastructureRelevant BA/BS degreeStrong analytical skills and comfortable with large sets of dataExperience working with CRM systems required (salesforce.com, Siebel, SAP, Oracle),Experience with at least 1 Marketing Automation systems, Exact Target, Pardot, EloquaExperience in requirements gatheringExcellent verbal and written communication skillsTeam player, able to work with global cross-functional teamsHigh energy with the ability to work well under pressure and tight deadlines in a fast paced, changing environment
